item.title: Work history
item.description: About Experienced and accomplished business/system analyst in technology environments. Master Certification from Schulich Executive Education Centre in Business Analysis. Expertise in transformation, enhancement and maintenance projects. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. Skilled in inception, elaboration and implementation of computer systems (web/mobile). Ability to manage teams and prioritize tasks in a rapidly changing environment. Expertise: Presentation, Leadership, Business Analysis, SDLC, Agile / Scrum / Waterfall, Elicitation, Interviews, JAD sessions, User Stories, Wire Frames & Mock-ups, UML Diagrams, Data Modeling, Flowcharts, Process Flows, Web development, iOS development, APIs development, SQL, Python, HTML, JIRA/Confluence, HPQC, MS Visio, MS Office
